original_text: Immediately what had been said about Nebuchadnezzar was fulfilled. He was driven away from people and ate grass like the ox. His body was drenched with the dew of heaven until his hair grew like the feathers of an eagle and his nails like the claws of a bird.
korean_text: 바로 그 때에 이 일이 나 느부갓네살에게 응하므로 내가 사람에게 쫓겨나서 소처럼 풀을 먹으며 몸이 하늘 이슬에 젖고 머리털이 독수리 털과 같이 자랐고 손톱은 새 발톱과 같이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: He was driven away from people
His body was drenched with dew of heaven
until his hair grew like feathers of an eagle
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리카락이 독수리 깃털처럼 자랄 때까지

sentences.original_text: and his nails like claws of a bird
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 손톱이 새 발톱처럼 되었다
